channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Clogau Jewellery
channel.desc: Every item in this stunning selection of gold jewellery contains rare Welsh gold from the Clogau St David's Gold Mine - the mine that has provided gold for Royal wedding rings.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Marla Wynne's Unmissable Deals
channel.desc: Fill your wardrobe with versatile fashion pieces from MarlaWynne and save today with our great deals.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Marla Wynne's Unmissable Deals
channel.desc: Fill your wardrobe with versatile fashion pieces from MarlaWynne and save today with our great deals.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Slipper Shop
channel.desc: Discover our Slipper Shop show and keep your feet toasty and warm with our range including designs with hard soles and orthotic technology plus cosy sheepskin styles.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Nightwear Edit
channel.desc: Update your nightwear collection with our fabulous selection of comfy pyjamas, snuggly robes and soft, stylish nightdresses. You'll be all set for snooze time.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Annie Haak Jewellery
channel.desc: Discover Annie Haak Jewellery, a gorgeous range of fine designs comprising necklaces, pendants, earrings, bracelets and more. A great gift at any idea, you'll love what Annie Haak has to offer.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Your Transitional Style Edit
channel.desc: From cool summer evenings to early autumn showers, join us now to find the fashion picks that will help you to transition seamlessly into the colder months ahead.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Denim & Co Best of Autumn
channel.desc: Denim & Co Best of Autumn.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Vionic Footwear with FMT Technology
channel.desc: A fashionable and comfortable footwear range with biomechanically-designed orthotic technology, which helps restore natural foot function and promote well-being with every step.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Morning Style with Katy
channel.desc: Join Katy and our trusted stylists and fashion experts as we help you create your perfect wardrobe, showing you how to bring key pieces and different looks together to showcase your personal style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ruth Langsford New Leisurewear
channel.desc: Make down time more special in chic leisurewear designs from the Ruth Langsford collection. You'll find the perfect outfits for off-duty days.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Best of QVC Style
channel.desc: Catch all the recent highlights from our sister channel with the Best of QVC Style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Fashion on Friday
channel.desc: Step into the world of Helene Berman, offering beautiful womenswear that boasts a classic, elegant style you'll love. Keep things timeless in your wardrobe with this fabulous collection.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Fashion on Friday with Julia
channel.desc: Offering great colours, quality fabrics and exciting fashion designs for every woman. Treat yourself and go shopping with Julia Roberts.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Centigrade Outerwear
channel.desc: A wide range of high-quality, fashion-inspired coats and jackets in soft, luxurious fabrics. This competitively-priced collection is designed to complete your daytime or evening look to perfection.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Nightwear Edit
channel.desc: Update your nightwear collection with our fabulous selection of comfy pyjamas, snuggly robes and soft, stylish nightdresses. You'll be all set for snooze time.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Nina Leonard
channel.desc: A collection of beautifully designed and elegant knitwear dresses, skirts and sweaters with co-ordinated accessories.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Morning Style with Katy
channel.desc: Join Katy and our trusted stylists and fashion experts as we help you create your perfect wardrobe, showing you how to bring key pieces and different looks together to showcase your personal style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Marla Wynne Autumn Edit
channel.desc: Marla Wynne Autumn Edit.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Diamonique Jewellery
channel.desc: Showcasing a wide range of beautiful Diamonique designs in both silver and gold, this show offers an emporium of both the classic and essential looks plus unusual rare cuts and sparkling colours.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Vionic Footwear with FMT Technology
channel.desc: A fashionable and comfortable footwear range with biomechanically-designed orthotic technology, which helps restore natural foot function and promote well-being with every step.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Y.A.S Fashion
channel.desc: Tune in and discover Y.A.S, a contemporary fashion brand who create for those who love fashion and freedom of expression. Enhance your wardrobe with their beautifully crafted designs.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim & Co Cosy Knit
channel.desc: Get set for chilly weather with a range of cosy knitwear from Kim & Co including jumpers, cardigans and more.
